title: Looking For Malph/Yas player in Bronze
body:
Looking to get out of bronze: 
I figured that the malph yasuo combo is extremely strong in bronze elo, and if anyone is a experienced malphite OR yasuo player to add me. The past few games i have played with yas/malph have been very succesful. If interested add me...

Thx, Wolphite

replies.body:
I Main yasuo all the way, 200k Mastery :) add me if your interested bro!

Euphener
Silv 3 player, yasuo is one of my mains, mid or top.
Isn't Malph perma banned in bronze along with Blitz and Amumu...?
I'm a player in bronze but imo permaban is Blitz and Zed
Hello I main top and mid and Yas is one of my mid picks! Add me if your interested
